# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Inserter group at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Boiler and steam engine at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Electricity group at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of following entities
-  Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
-  Ensure that entities such as burner mining drills, boilers, and steam engines have a sufficient fuel supply to operate.
### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
-  Ensure that entities such as burner inserters have a source of items to operate.
### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that entities such as steam engines are connected to the necessary pipes or belts to operate.
### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
-  Ensure that entities such as electricity groups are plugged into the electric network to operate.
### Errors when pipe groups are empty
-  Ensure that pipe groups have a sufficient supply of fluids to operate.


# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
